author: Corey Knapp
title: April 6: What to Watch in Sports This Week When There Are No Sports This Week
description: Today was supposed to be a big day in the sports calendar. The NCAA Tournament National Championship Game was scheduled for tonight in Atlanta...
content:
Tiger Woods will have to wait until 2021 to defend his incredible Masters victory from 2019.Matt Slocum/Associated Press
